title: AkiraDocs Quickstart Guide
description: Get started with AkiraDocs in minutes with this quickstart guide
author: AkiraDocs Team

blocks.content: Follow these steps to create your first documentation project with AkiraDocs.

1. Create a new page
2. Add content blocks
3. Preview your changes
4. Publish your documentation

# Create a new page
npx akiradocs new page guides/welcome

# Start the development server
npm run dev
Make sure you have completed the installation steps before proceeding with project initialization.

1. Initialize your documentation structure
2. Configure your sidebar navigation
3. Set up your theme
4. Add your first content

# Initialize your documentation
npx akiradocs init

# Configure your project
npx akiradocs configure
